component.name: searchScopeAndOrder
component.description: Returns an ordered list of objects in the default global search scope of a logged-in user.

component.name: searchResultLayout
component.description: Returns search result layout information for the objects in the query string

component.name: searchSuggestedRecords
component.description: Returns a list of suggested records whose names match the user’s search string

component.name: searchSuggestedArticleTitle
component.description: Returns a list of Salesforce Knowledge articles whose titles match the user’s search query string

component.name: searchSuggestedQueries
component.description: Returns a list of suggested searches based on the user’s query string text matching searches that other users have performed in Salesforce Knowledge
